item.title: Campus North Plus Sports Running Walking Gym Shoes for Men
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Material Type: Mesh Lifestyle: Sports Warranty Type: Manufacturer Care Instructions: Allow your pair of shoes to air and de-odorize at...
item.content:encoded:
• Material Type: Mesh
  • Lifestyle: Sports
  • Warranty Type: Manufacturer
  • Care Instructions: Allow your pair of shoes to air and de-odorize at a regular basis, this also helps them retain their natural shape; use shoe bags to prevent any stains or mildew; dust any dry dirt from the surface using a clean cloth, do not use polish or shiner
  • Disclaimer: There may be slight variations in color and texture between pictures & actual product. Also color may slightly vary due to lighting on the photography

item.title: OFF LIMITS Men’s STUSSYY (Memory TECH) Running Shoes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Phylon TPR sole provides traction and grip over varied surfaces The upper has a PU base and a super soft...
item.content:encoded:
• Phylon TPR sole provides traction and grip over varied surfaces
  • The upper has a PU base and a super soft lining for added comfort.
  • Advance Memory Cushion Tech- Superioir Cushioning & Feel.
  • Enhanced grip, traction, flexibility and stability.
  • Care Instructions: Allow you pair of shoes to air and de-odorize at a regular basis, this also helps them retain their natural shape; use shoe bags to prevent any stains or mildew; dust any dry dirt from the surface using a clean cloth; do not use polish or shiner

item.title: ASIAN Men’s Wonder-13 Sports Running Shoes
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Lightweight & Breathable : Exclusive design and durable materials every step feels light and breezy. Breathable, free-moving fabrics which adjust...
item.content:encoded:
• Lightweight & Breathable : Exclusive design and durable materials every step feels light and breezy. Breathable, free-moving fabrics which adjust according to your foot and creates an astoundingly easy-going experience.
  • Non Slip & Shockproof : Great engineering strikes a balance in style, made in the potent design and latest fashion trends. Made for long-term wear, with extra emphasis on providing cushion to the feet, removing heel strain.
  • Comfort Sole & Flexible Walk : The outsoles are made by an air cushion, doubling the effect of shock absorption. Besides, these shoes perform excellent in durability and are also slip resistant. It provides push cushioning comfort for foot pain relief and helps relieve pressure while conforming to your every step

  • Size: UK 12 to UK 14

item.title: Haier 6 Kg 5 star Fully Automatic Top Loading Washing Machine
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fully-automatic top load washing machine with Oceanus Wave Technology: Affordable with great wash quality, Easy to use; Has both washing...
item.content:encoded:
• Fully-automatic top load washing machine with Oceanus Wave Technology: Affordable with great wash quality, Easy to use; Has both washing and drying functions
  • Capacity – 6 Kg : Suitable for Small family
  • Energy Rating 5 Star : Best in class efficiency | Energy consumption – 0.0095* KWh/kg/cycle & Water Consumption: 21.21 L/Kg/Cycle (Please refer BEE label for more information)
  • Manufacturer Warranty: 5 years on product and 20 years on motor
  • 780 RPM: Higher spin speeds helps in faster wash and drying; 40 min cycle time for avg. load
  • Wash Programs: 8 No.of Programs -Normal|Shirt|Spin|Delicate|Quick|P1-PA|Heavy|Sports|Eco|Silk|Soak|Wool|Baby care|Synthetic|Rinse + Spin | Air dry
  • Drum / Pulsator type & Body material – Fully Stainless Steel Drum built to bring convenience and durability, which makes your washing machine last longer.

item.title: HP Laptop 15s, 12th Gen Intel Core i5
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 【10-core 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U】Unleash your productivity with this high-performing processor. With 12 threads and 12MB L3 cache, it’s...
item.content:encoded:
• 【10-core 12th Gen Intel Core i5-1235U】Unleash your productivity with this high-performing processor. With 12 threads and 12MB L3 cache, it’s designed for quick, efficient multitasking.
  • 【Intel Iris Xe graphics】Experience captivating visuals and high-quality performance with integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics. Perfect for creative work and casual gaming.
  • 【Enhanced memory and storage】With 16GB DDR4-3200 MHz RAM, and a 512 GB PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD, experience rapid loading and ample storage for all your files.
  • 【Micro-edge display】Enjoy vibrant colors on the 15.6″ Full HD screen. With a resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, it delivers crisp, clear visuals for an immersive viewing experience.
  • 【Long-lasting battery】Fast charge up to 50% in 45 mins. Stay unplugged longer with the 3-cell, 41 Wh battery and power through your day without the need for constant charging.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy M14 5G
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Superfast 5G with 13 5G Bands, Powerful Exynos 1330 Octa Core 2.4GH 5nm processor with latest Android 13 having One...
item.content:encoded:
• Superfast 5G with 13 5G Bands, Powerful Exynos 1330 Octa Core 2.4GH 5nm processor with latest Android 13 having One UI 5.0 interface
  • 50MP+2MP+2MP Triple camera setup- True 50MP (F1.8) main camera + 2MP (F2.4) + 2MP (F2.4)| 13MP (F2.0) front camera
  • 6000mAh lithium-ion battery, 1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase
  • 16.72 centimeters (6.6-inch) LCD, FHD+ resolution with 1080 x 2408 pixels resolution, 401 PPI with 16M color
  • Get up to 2 times of Android Updates & 4 times of Security Updates with Samsung Galaxy M14 5G.

item.title: Boat Rockerz 450 Bluetooth On Ear Headphones with Mic
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Playback- It provides a massive battery backup of upto 15 hours for a superior playback time. Charging Time : 3...
item.content:encoded:
• Playback- It provides a massive battery backup of upto 15 hours for a superior playback time. Charging Time : 3 Hours
  • Drivers- Its 40mm dynamic drivers help pump out immersive HD audio all day long.
  • Earcushions- It has been ergonomically designed and structured as an on-ear headphone to provide the best user experience with its comfortable padded earcushions and lightweight design
  • Controls- You can control your music without hiccups using the easy access controls, communicate seamlessly using the built-in mic, access voice assistant and always stay in the zone
  • Dual Modes- One can connect to boAt Rockerz 450 via not one but two modes, Bluetooth as well as AUX
  • 1 year warranty from the date of purchase

item.title: beSOLiD Airy Linen Kurta Pant Set for Women’s
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Package content:- Linen straight kurta with pant set for womens. Crafted from a blend of linen and cotton, the kurti...
item.content:encoded:
• Package content:- Linen straight kurta with pant set for womens.
  • Crafted from a blend of linen and cotton, the kurti offers a comfortable and flexible fit with a touch of sophistication. The linen cotton material not only ensures comfort but also provides a luxurious and breathable feel.
  • The open collar and rolled-up sleeves design adds a contemporary and chic element to the kurti, enhancing the neckline with a stylish flair.
  • Traditional wear, casual Wear, evening wear, office wear, daily wear. Stay fresh and confident all summer long with our women’s kurti and pant made from durable and breathable fabric.
  • Care instructions: do not bleach & tumble dry, only machine/hand wash, gentle tumble dry & low temperature ironing.
